Returns: Return true if you have consumed the action, else false.
Parameters: TextView: The view that was clicked.
int: Identifier of the action. This will be either the identifier you supplied, or @B_android#view#inputmethod#EditorInfo#IME_NULL_E@ if being called due to the enter key being pressed.
KeyEvent: If triggered by an enter key, this is the event; otherwise, this is null.
onEditorAction(android.widget.TextView,i.Description: Called when an action is being performed.
onEditorAction(android.widget.TextView,i.FullName: public abstract boolean onEditorAction (TextView v, int actionId, KeyEvent event)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an action is performed on the editor.
